name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Unrelenting_Fury_F
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Unrelenting Fury F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives this power a chance to grant you a small regeneration and endurance discount bonus and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This regeneration and endurance discount buff stacks up to 5 times. This effect will trigger roughly 7 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Brutes and may be slotted into any Brute damage power.
power_display_names: Superior Unrelenting Fury: Recharge/Chance for +Regen/+End Discount (Brute)
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for +Regen/+End Discount
